医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
癌症药物研发的过去、现在和未来2023 年 8 月 17 日，《Oncoscience》（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“癌症药物开发的昨天、今天和明天”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/The-past-present-and-future-of-cancer-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/The-past-present-and-future-of-cancer-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3edd26ed-1f62-4ddf-baa1-cfc9cedd18b6 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:38:12 -0400 The past, present, and future of cancer drug development
研究可以解释为什么宇航员的 T 细胞在抵抗感染方面变得不那么有效瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究研究了失重如何影响免疫系统的 T 细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-could-explain-why-astronauts-T-cells-become-less- effective-at-fighting-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Study-could-explain-why-astronauts-T-cells-become-less- effective-at-fighting-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc9f9de2-5343-46e7-8875-433e169cdc19 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:27:07 -0400 Study could explain why astronauts' T cells become less effective at fighting infection
受折纸启发的应变传感器可以帮助检测疾病南加州大学维特比工程学院的研究人员希望通过折纸来创造新的传感器，这些传感器有朝一日可用于检测器官的变形，也可用于可穿戴设备和软机器人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Origami-inspired-strain-sensors-could-help-detect-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Origami-inspired-strain-sensors-could-help-detect-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6229d0eb-cf85-4d2a-9220-adb5cd562856 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:23:07 -0400
纤毛病：对 NSL 复合体作用的新认识非特异性致死 (NSL) 复合物是一种染色质相关因子，已被证明可以调节果蝇和哺乳动物中数千个基因的表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Ciliopathies-A-new-understanding-of-the-role-of-the-NSL-complex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Ciliopathies-A-new-understanding-of-the-role-of-the-NSL-complex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b411e44-f938-436b-88a1-a7bd1d6de510 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:17:31 -0400 Ciliopathies: A new understanding of the role of the NSL complex
新指南支持使用对乙酰氨基酚和非甾体抗炎药治疗小儿牙痛根据美国牙科协会科学研究制定的新临床实践指南，推荐对乙酰氨基酚或布洛芬等非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID) 作为治疗 12 岁以下儿童短期牙痛的一线治疗方法研究所 (ADASRI)、匹兹堡大学牙科医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学牙科医学院全球综合口腔健康中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-guideline-supports-use-of-acetaminophen-and-NSAIDs-for-pediatric-dental-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-guideline-supports-use-of-acetaminophen-and-NSAIDs-for-pediatric-dental-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9aed45ad-6004-4736-9288-ad7ea96e1bfa Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:11:42 -0400 New guideline supports use of acetaminophen and NSAIDs for pediatric dental pain
COVID-19 大流行期间，医院的患者就诊体验大幅下降兰德公司的一项新研究显示，在 COVID-19 大流行期间住院的患者的经历比危机前几年明显恶化，人员配备水平较高的医院保持较高分数的时间更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Patient-experiences-in-hospitals-declined-significantly-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Patient-experiences-in-hospitals-declined-significantly-during-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88dadc85-69e2-4739-a456-8082f8fb8ca9 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:03:59 -0400 Patient experiences in hospitals declined significantly during COVID-19 pandemic
COVID-19 大流行期间，心理健康服务支出增加了 53%一项新的研究显示，自 COVID-19 大流行开始以来，拥有私人健康保险的美国人在心理健康服务上的支出激增，尽管远程医疗的使用已趋于稳定，但这一支出仍在继续上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Spending-on-mental-health-services-rose-by-5325-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Spending-on-mental-health-services-rose-by-5325-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f20f4cc8-cf06-4cf6-96e6-a97254746529 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 23:00:17 -0400 Spending on mental health services rose by 53% during the COVID-19 pandemic
患有精神健康障碍的孕妇和产后妇女更有可能使用大麻罗格斯大学领导的一项研究表明，患有精神健康障碍的孕妇和最近产后的妇女可能很容易使用大麻进行自我治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Pregnant-and-postpartum-women-with-mental-health-disorders-more-likely-to-use-cannabis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Pregnant-and-postpartum-women-with-mental-health-disorders-more-likely-to-use-cannabis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2dd7ee83-c2bc-4409-8fbc-218ff6d4b744 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 22:52:28 -0400 Pregnant and postpartum women with mental health disorders more likely to use cannabis
磁珠中的新光学特征可以快速检测诊断测试中的污染物血液检测结果可能需要一天到一周的时间，具体取决于检测的目标。水污染和食品污染的检测也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-optical-signature-in-Magnetic-beads-could-quickly-detect-contaminants-in-diagnostic-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-optical-signature-in-Magnetic-beads-could-quickly-detect-contaminants-in-diagnostic-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe830e02-fbf1-4e02-a74b-a67308e8f75b Fri, 25 Aug 2023 22:46:36 -0400 New optical signature in magnetic beads could quickly detect contaminants in diagnostic tests
研究显示 MRI 引导消融可改善年轻 AFib 患者的预后根据一项新的人工智能引导的 DECAAF II 试验结果分析（全球最大的研究之一），年轻的房颤 (AFib) 患者最有可能受益于更个性化的 MRI 引导消融治疗，以纠正心律不齐心律失常的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/MRI-guided-ablation-improves-outcomes-for-younger-AFib-病人-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/MRI-guided-ablation-improves-outcomes-for-younger-AFib-病人-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c177d6f6-c1fe-4c25-9f40-1b24d226be6e Fri, 25 Aug 2023 22:42:25 -0400 MRI-guided ablation improves outcomes for younger AFib patients, study shows
